content.question: In context, "elbow room" (Paragraph 3) refers to

choices.label: a desire to establish a hierarchy among avant-garde artists
a justification for elevating the social position of artists
the inspiration to create something truly original
a private physical space in which to create art

content.answer: a justification for elevating the social position of artists

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
